column2: "Sar do na asaase kɛsɛɛ do bɛyɛ enyigye; na sar pradada edzi ehurusi

column3: na ɔdze dɛw na adwontow mpo edzi ehurusi; wɔdze Lebanon enyimnyam Karmel na Saron abɔsoyɛ no bɛma no: wobohu EWURADZE n’enyimnyam

column2: "Hom nhyɛ nsa a ɔayɛ mberɛw no dzen
column3: na hom mmiamia anankoroma a egura no mu."

column2: "Hom nse hɔn a hɔn akoma etu no dɛ
column6: nye Nyankopɔn ne nhyɛananmu bɛba; ɔbɛba abɛgye hom nkwa."

column3: na omum ne tɛkyerɛma atow ndwom: na esuesu botuetue wɔ sar do
column4: na nwora wɔ sar pradada do."

column3: na asaase kwawee no adan mbansu: mbrɛ nkyɛ mpataku butubutuwii no
column4: nkyɛkyɛr befifir hɔ aka ndzɛmbir na mbɛw ho."

column3: na wɔbɛfrɛ no Krɔnkrɔn kwan; ɔhoɔfifo nnkɛfa do; na ɔno na wɔdze bɛma hɔn: na nkwasea mpo
eso abowa dzifodzepɛfo biara nnkɔfow afa do
column4: wonnkohu hɔn wɔ hɔ; na hɔn a wɔapon hɔn no na wɔbɛnantsew hɔ."
na wɔdze adwontow aba Zion; na daa enyigye bɛtsena hɔn etsifi: wobenya ahomka na dɛw
column5: na awerɛhow na nkrumsi eguan akɔ."
